abstract: If and when Theo Epstein takes over the Chicago Cubs franchise, he will inherit a team with major issues, but one that does have some talent to work with.
snippet: If and when Theo Epstein takes over the Chicago Cubs franchise, he will inherit a team with major issues, but one that does have some talent to work with.
lead_paragraph: Much of the focus of the discussion in regards to Theo Epstein's potential hiring as general manager of the Cubs has been centered around the fact that the team is buried under the weight of bad contracts and that there are no reinforcements on the way.
